Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Hi, <MYNAME>. Thank you so much for
building my house!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>My name is <BLUE>Rod</BLUE>. I'm finally able to move
to this lovely town, thanks to you
building a house for me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>I hope to become good friends with
everyone living here!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. If you're running a farm
then you'll need help with handling
livestock, won't you?
<PAGE>
I'm going to be running a pet shop in
town. I'll be selling lots of reliable
pets, so come by the <GREEN>Plaza</GREEN> some time!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be looking forward to you coming by
my shop! See you soon!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
